resources.string: Sorry, this alert was not found
There was a server error while getting alert data
An unknown error occurred while getting alert data:
This app will collect your device\'s approximate location to send alert notifications, even when the app is closed.
You choose to not allow background location usage. Alerts will still work but will use the location from the last time the app was opened.
Without this permission, alerts can not be sent for this location. Are you sure you want to deny this permission? You can alternatively enter a fixed location.

It looks like your using an older version of android which does not support notification channels. Alerts will still work but low, medium, high, and extreme alerts will all use your default notification sound and appear the same way. You can still disable the notification using the none channel.
Device location has changed since last update
